Description:
Detects known malicious service installation that appear in cases in which a Sliver implants execute the PsExec commands

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Sliver C2 Default Service Installation
Query: sourcetype='windows-system' eql select * from _source_ where ((provider_name = 'service control manager' and eventid = '7045') and (imagepath re '^[a-zA-Z]:\\windows\\temp\\[a-zA-Z0-9]{10}\.exe' or (servicename = 'sliver' or servicename = 'sliver implant')))
